name: The Conversation Tree
description:
The Conversation Tree accosts you on a small shortcut home. It won't let you leave. If you can outsmart it, you might yet escape.

A Twine game made to practice writing interactive dialogue, as well as parodying dialogue trees rigidity in video games.

Feedback or bugs can go to twitter.com/@Elisenaps but I'm unlikely to update the game beyond bug fixes.

There's a bunch of blank spaces in the game because I didn't want to spend a lot of time figuring out how to remove them, but I've removed most other formatting issues and bugs. If some of the logic seems funny, it might be intentional.
